property.name: sObjectLookupIDField
property.label: sObject Lookup Field API Name
property.description: Leave blank on Home and App Pages for a List or Filtered List.

property.name: additionalWhereClause
property.label: (Additional) WHERE Clause in SOQL Query
property.description: Leave blank on Record Pages for a Related List. Leave blank on Home and App Pages for a List. Use NOW() to compare date time to now

property.name: includeName
property.label: Include Name with hyperlink?
property.description: Automatically adds the Name field and hyperlinks. Do not add Name field to field set if this is TRUE

property.name: orderBy
property.label: order By
property.description: Field and order to sort the results. For example, 'CreatedDate desc'

property.name: iconName
property.label: Icon Name
property.description: SLDS Icon to use for the related list. See https://www.lightningdesignsystem.com/icons/ for more info. Format should be icon_type:icon_name. For example, for the Person Account icon, the value shoudl be standard:person_account

property.name: recordId
property.label: Record Id
property.description: The value should be {!recordId} required for Sites.

property.name: sitePath
property.label: Path of site
property.description: The path of the site for reference fields (case sensitive).
